name: murder-in-olympus
description: A Werewolf hidden in plain sight Can you survive the night?

scripts.start: concurrently -n "FRONT,GAME,BACK" -c "cyan,magenta,yellow" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:game" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && myenv\Scripts\activate && python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000
